pages.text: Originally bred for bull baiting, these dogs have earned a bad reputation after being used for dog fighting. Despite this, they can prove to be loyal and trustable companions.$(br2)Standing just under a block tall, these fierce dogs come in seven different coats.
These dogs are most commonly found in dark forests, jungles, and taigas. They can also be found in old growth taigas, and more rarely savanna plateaus.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Beef Treat.
